additionalDescription: This dataset includes data from the dataset named 'Panama Katydids soundscape'
annotationsType: Frequency and time bounding of calls
description: Collection of audio files along with manual annotations (in Raven Pro selection table format) for use in training machine learning models for recognizing sounds of neotropical katydids. The collection contains data that was used for training the models described in: Madhusudhana S, Klinck H, Symes LB (2024). Extensive data engineering to the rescue: building a multi-species katydid detector from unbalanced, atypical training datasets. Phil. Trans. R. Soc. B 20230444. DOI: 10.1098/rstb.2023.0444
name: Panama Katydid
title: Sounds of neotropical katydids from Barro Colorado Island, Panama
